title: Interactive Instructional Design Strategies for Online Science Project-Based Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced theoretical knowledge and mastery of high-level application skills
context.additional_context: Online collaborative environment for science-related vocational project implementation at workforce training institutions

learning_goals: Learners can complete at least three science projects within six months using online collaboration tools.
Learners can apply interactive techniques (Q&A, feedback) in over 80% of real-time video conference sessions.
Learners can produce five or more visual science reports using digital content creation tools.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
